text: Intelligent questions and answers that are profound, rich, important, and necessary to this season of Fountain of Truth, we’re asked.

data.title: FROM THE HEART OF BISHOP SAMUEL VALVERDE
data.content:
This beautiful interview conducted by FTC Bogota, uncovers Bishop Valverde’s sincere and transparent heart. Intelligent questions and answers that are profound, rich, important, and necessary to this season of Fountain of Truth, we’re asked:
  • Why “Every Heart Healed”
  • Why exit from the Assembly?
  • What has been your hardest experience of brokenness?
  • Why is it important to heal?
  • Why Colombia?
  • What is the vision for Bogota and for Colombia in general?
  • What is your desire for the Oneness Pentecostal churches of Jesus Christ?
  • What is forthcoming for the Global Oneness Church?
  • What is your position regarding the Oneness church?
  • Who is Pastor Alvaro Ocampo?
  • What advice do you have for young pastors?
  • What should the relationship between Oneness churches be?
  • What is the legacy that you will be leaving to the next generation?
We hope you enjoy!
